languages.text: "Все... несколько сложнее, чем ты способ{mf|ен|на} осознать. Наша старинная игра должна закончиться. Мой первый шаг пошел прахом из-за предательства Назракея — теперь мне остается только довести начатое до конца. Своими руками добить ее, пока она не добила меня".

"It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."
languages.original_text: "Все... несколько сложнее, чем ты способ{mf|ен|на} осознать. Наша старинная игра должна закончиться. Мой первый шаг пошел прахом из-за предательства Назракея — теперь мне остается только довести начатое до конца. Своими руками добить ее, пока она не добила меня".

traits.locale_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

traits.locale_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “这件事情……非常复杂，远远超出你的理解能力。我们曾经的游戏必须结束了。我走出的第一步，就因为纳札骸的背叛而走偏了。如今我要做的事情，就是亲手结束我引发的一切，在她杀了我之前亲手杀了她。”
languages.original_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

traits.locale_text: “这件事情……非常复杂，远远超出你的理解能力。我们曾经的游戏必须结束了。我走出的第一步，就因为纳札骸的背叛而走偏了。如今我要做的事情，就是亲手结束我引发的一切，在她杀了我之前亲手杀了她。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「全体像は…なんとも複雑だから、お前には理解できない。長く続いたこのゲームを終わらせなければならない。ナズラクヘイが裏切ったせいで、初手はうまくいかなかった。俺がすべきことは、始めたことを完了すること。殺られる前に、この手であの女を倒す」
languages.original_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

traits.locale_text: 「全体像は…なんとも複雑だから、お前には理解できない。長く続いたこのゲームを終わらせなければならない。ナズラクヘイが裏切ったせいで、初手はうまくいかなかった。俺がすべきことは、始めたことを完了すること。殺られる前に、この手であの女を倒す」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Es todo... un poco más complicado de lo que puedes llegar a comprender. Nuestro jueguecito debe llegar a su fin. Mi primera jugada se malogró debido a la perfidia de Nazrakhei. Ahora lo único que debo hacer es terminar lo que empecé: destruirla con mis propias manos antes de que ella me destruya a mí».
languages.original_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

traits.locale_text: «Es todo... un poco más complicado de lo que puedes llegar a comprender. Nuestro jueguecito debe llegar a su fin. Mi primera jugada se malogró debido a la perfidia de Nazrakhei. Ahora lo único que debo hacer es terminar lo que empecé: destruirla con mis propias manos antes de que ella me destruya a mí».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « La situation est un peu trop... compliquée pour que vous soyez en mesure de comprendre. Le petit jeu auquel nous jouons depuis si longtemps doit prendre fin. Si ma première tentative a mal tourné en raison de la fourberie de Nazrakhei, il ne me reste plus qu'à terminer ce que j'ai commencé et à l'anéantir de mes propres mains avant qu'elle ne prenne les devants. »
languages.original_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

traits.locale_text: « La situation est un peu trop... compliquée pour que vous soyez en mesure de comprendre. Le petit jeu auquel nous jouons depuis si longtemps doit prendre fin. Si ma première tentative a mal tourné en raison de la fourberie de Nazrakhei, il ne me reste plus qu'à terminer ce que j'ai commencé et à l'anéantir de mes propres mains avant qu'elle ne prenne les devants. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Die Sache ist zu kompliziert, als dass Ihr sie verstehen könntet. Unsere alte Fehde muss ein Ende finden. Mein erster Schritt wurde durch Nazrakheis Verrat vereitelt. Jetzt bleibt mir nur noch zu beenden, was ich begonnen habe – ich muss sie mit meinen eigenen Händen auslöschen, bevor sie es tut."
languages.original_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

traits.locale_text: "Die Sache ist zu kompliziert, als dass Ihr sie verstehen könntet. Unsere alte Fehde muss ein Ende finden. Mein erster Schritt wurde durch Nazrakheis Verrat vereitelt. Jetzt bleibt mir nur noch zu beenden, was ich begonnen habe – ich muss sie mit meinen eigenen Händen auslöschen, bevor sie es tut."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

languages.text: "Bunların hepsi... Kafanın basabileceğinden bir miktar daha karmaşık. Eskiden beri süregelen oyunumuz, artık sona ermeli. Nazrakhei'in hainliği yüzünden ilk adımımı yanlış attım. Şimdi de başladığımı bitirmem gerek. O beni yok etmeden önce onu kendi ellerimle yok etmeliyim."
languages.original_text: "It is all... somewhat more complicated than you are capable of understanding. Our game of old must come to an end. My first step went awry because of Nazrakhei's treachery. Now all I must do is finish what I started — destroy her with my own hands before she destroys me."

traits.locale_text: "Bunların hepsi... Kafanın basabileceğinden bir miktar daha karmaşık. Eskiden beri süregelen oyunumuz, artık sona ermeli. Nazrakhei'in hainliği yüzünden ilk adımımı yanlış attım. Şimdi de başladığımı bitirmem gerek. O beni yok etmeden önce onu kendi ellerimle yok etmeliyim."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
